statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, game_progress FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE game_progress > 50 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_progress FROM player_profiles WHERE game_progress < 25 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_progress FROM player_profiles WHERE game_progress > 50 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT player_name FROM player_profiles WHERE game_progress BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY game_progress DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_progress FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 2
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 3;
SELECT player_id, game_name, level, score FROM game_progress WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM player_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT game_name, level FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT id, username, email FROM player_profiles ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT player_id, game_name, level, score FROM game_progress WHERE score > 500 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, game_name, level, score FROM game_progress WHERE level BETWEEN 2 AND 5
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM PlayerProfiles ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT game_id, progress_percent FROM GameProgress WHERE progress_percent > 50;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM Achievements WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT player_name, level FROM PlayerProfiles ORDER BY level DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM GameProgress GROUP BY player_id, player_name
SELECT * FROM Achievements WHERE achievement_type = 'Completed' AND date_achieved BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS player_count, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM GameProgress
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM player_profiles WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT game_title, genre FROM indie_games WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY game_title ASC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, level_completed FROM player_progress WHERE level_completed > 5 ORDER BY level_completed DESC;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM indie_games WHERE genre = 'Puzzle' ORDER BY release_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, level_completed, score FROM player_profiles JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id WHERE player_progress.level_completed > 5 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT player_name, game_title, rating FROM player_profiles JOIN player_ratings ON player_profiles.player_id = player_ratings.player_id JOIN indie_games ON player_ratings.game_id = indie_games.game_id WHERE player_ratings.rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT player_profiles.player_name, COUNT(player_progress.progress_id) AS total_progress FROM player_profiles LEFT JOIN player_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = player_progress.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.player_name HAVING total_progress > 10 ORDER BY total_progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name FROM players JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements WHERE achievement_points >= 50;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;

SELECT p.player_name, a.achievement_name FROM players p JOIN player_achievements pa ON p.player_id = pa.player_id JOIN achievements a ON pa.achievement_id = a.achievement_id ORDER BY p.player_name ASC;
